short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate and assign Profit First percentages in two clicks. Check out the screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculating your Profit First percentages every time you add income to your YNAB budget can get tedious. That's why I built this Chrome extension. I didn't like the back and forth, going between a calculator and my YNAB window. Now that process is so much faster! Faster than a calculator, faster than a spreadsheet.

Install Percentager for YNAB and make your workflow that much smoother. It's completely free.
